# packages/ (auto-generated)

This folder contains per-room helper package files generated by `generate_humidity_packages_templated.py`.

**Do not edit files here manually.** Re-run the generator to regenerate them.

```bash
python blueprints/automation/bathroom_fan_from_humidity/generate_humidity_packages_templated.py \
  --rooms "Half Bathroom" \
  --template blueprints/automation/bathroom_fan_from_humidity/room_humidity_baseline_delta_package.template.yaml \
  --out blueprints/automation/bathroom_fan_from_humidity/packages
```

Generated files define the humidity baseline and delta template sensors required by the `bathroom_fan_from_humidity_delta.yaml` blueprint. Load them with:

```yaml
homeassistant:
  packages: !include_dir_merge_named packages/
```
